name: Hello Traveller
description:
Discover the marvelous world of administration !

More precisely, the administration of an adventurer's guild. Send heroes on quest, but don't take your responsibility lightly or they might die...

The graphics and the audio were made by Exys, and the programming was done by Feufoll

There are a few bugs that we know of, for example :

  • Weird paperclip placements
  • Sheet scaling messing up, mostly when leaving the table
  • Heros you don't know reporting from missions you didn't send them on
